code: import React from'react';import{Container,Wrapper,Left,Center,Right,Language,SearchContainer,Input,Logo,MenuItem,Badge}from'./styles/Navbar.styles';import{Search,ShoppingCartOutlined}from'@mui/icons-material';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{useCart}from'../context/CartContext';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Navbar=()=>{const{user,logout}=useAuth();const{getCartItemsCount}=useCart();const handleLogout=()=>{logout();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Wrapper,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Left,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Language,{children:"EN"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(SearchContainer,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{placeholder:"Search"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Search,{style:{color:"gray",fontSize:16}})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Center,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",style:{textDecoration:'none',color:'inherit'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Logo,{children:"SHOPEASY."})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Right,{children:[user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MenuItem,{children:["Welcome, ",user.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/orders",style:{textDecoration:'none',color:'inherit'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{children:"ORDERS"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{onClick:handleLogout,children:"LOGOUT"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/register",style:{textDecoration:'none',color:'inherit'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{children:"REGISTER"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/login",style:{textDecoration:'none',color:'inherit'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MenuItem,{children:"SIGN IN"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/cart",style:{textDecoration:'none',color:'inherit'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(MenuItem,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ShoppingCartOutlined,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Badge,{children:getCartItemsCount()})]})})]})]})});};export default Navbar;
